content: instructions for the size you are making 6 all sizes begin make a magic_ring round 1 chain 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring pull tail to close circle join with a slip_stitch to the top of the first st of the round 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same st where you joined 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch to the top of the first st of the round 12 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same st where you joined single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st around join with a slip_stitch to the top of the first st of the round 18 single_crochet continue with the instructions for the size you are making newborn to round 4 chain 3 half_double_crochet in second chain from the hook half_double_crochet in last chain skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st around toddler fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing makes 9 little waves child to round 4 chain 1 2 single_crochet in same st where you joined single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts adults 6 times join with a slip_stitch to the top of the first st of the round 24 single_crochet round 5 chain 3 half_double_crochet in second chain from the hook half_double_crochet in last chain skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st around fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing makes 12 little waves assembly take the top crown and thread the tail through your darning needle sew it on top of the hat by running your needle up and down through the top crown and the hat around the top crown use stitch markers to hold the top crown in place if needed cut and weave the ends inside the hat view from top julivia com © julivia all rights reserved tah yrrebeulb
